first_meeting.title: First Meeting
first_meeting.msg01: It's the first day of the new semester, and you've been assigned to a new class.
first_meeting.msg02: As you enter the classroom, one student catches your eye.
first_meeting.msg03: How would you like to start your first meeting with this student?
first_meeting.yuki_first_look: (A student reading by the window glances at you briefly.)

lunch_time.title: Lunch Time
lunch_time.msg02: Yuki takes out her lunch box and looks at you.
lunch_time.yuki_invite: Would you like to have lunch together?

after_school.title: After School
after_school.msg01: All classes for the day have ended.
after_school.msg02: Yuki packs her bag and speaks to you.
after_school.yuki_suggestion: Today was really fun. Let's talk again tomorrow!
